snippet.title: The Italian Job: L.A. Heist: Licensed Video Games #003 [PS2, 2003]
snippet.description: This week we look at the video game accompaniment to the 2003 reboot of The Italian Job, which it turns out is a fairly bare-bones arcade racer. I'm fairly sure that movie was just driving for 40 seconds at a time, sometimes in a stunt like fashion?
